page.title: 01Lower Heswall and Gayton
page.content: { Lower Heswall and Gayton {________________________ { The area consists of part of the res- {idential village of Lower Heswall and {residential area of Gayton.Much of {this is private housing.Bordering on {this are the recreational factilities {of the Wirral Way part of the Wirral {Country Park,developed from a disused {railway and the disused baths site at {Parkgate and the Heswall Golf Club. {There is also a large area of farm- {land,mostly pasture.Part of the area {is designated as a conservation area. {Saltmarsh borders the River Dee and {the area is home to plant and {wildlife. }
